                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                            <!-- 展示出的二级评论的回复框 -->

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/8783830191/pinglun" target="_blank">jyecdd</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->
                                                                            <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/user/tequan/" target="_blank">
                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/7.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://qneimg.smzdm.com/202501/15/67876730032987042.png" alt="">

                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">

                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>

                            </div>

                                <!-- 浮层 -->

                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>看着还不错，先报了名再说。</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                            </div>
                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div class="content-info"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-info -->
                                    <span>2023-10-24</span>
                                                                            <span>·</span>
                                        <span>浙江</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->
                                <div class="user-downed-fold">
                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                </div>
                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                <div class="content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->
                                
                                                                        <!-- 点赞 -->
                                    <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_279957654" data-item="3, 1, 279957654, 93656109, 279957654">
                                        <span>3</span>
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 点踩 --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 start --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class J_cai 删除class caiNum -->
                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->
                                        <!-- 已点踩 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->
                                        <div class="tips-down">
                                            <div class="content">
                                                取消点踩展示评论
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="arrow">
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 end -->

                                    </div>
                                    <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 end -->

                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">

                                        <i class="icon-thumb-up-o-thin"></i>
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-up"></i> -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- 点踩 --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 start --> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class J_cai 删除class caiNum -->
                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i> -->
                                        <!-- 已点踩 -->
                                        <!-- <i class="icon-thumb-down"></i> -->
                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->
                                        <div class="tips-down">
                                            <div class="content">
                                                取消点踩展示评论
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="arrow">
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 end -->

                                    </div>
                                    <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 end -->
                                    <!-- 回复 -->
                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">

                                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 start -->
                                                <div class="user-downed-fold">
                                                    <i class="icon-info-mark-o"></i>该评论被折叠
                                                </div>
                                                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论的文案 end -->
                                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-child content-operation"> <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增class content-operation -->
                                                
                                                                                                        <div class="J_zan comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_279954142" data-item="3, 1, 279954142, 93656109, 279954142">
                                                        <span></span>

                                                    <div class="J_cai comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan ">
                                                        <i class="icon-thumb-down-o-thin"></i>                                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 start -->

                                  <a href="https://www.smzdm.com/tag/t60qdor/" target="_blank" onclick="dataLayer.push({'event':'1210007','type':'tag','tag':'综合榜商品'});sensors.track('DetailModelClick', {'business':'好价','model_name':'本文收录在','sub_model_name':'tag','button_name':'综合榜商品'})">

      </div>
    </div>
